description: Reconfiguration to front and rear ground floor elevations including for access to South Molton Lane, alterations to upper floors to accommodate residential use, removal of staircase to 19 South Molton Street, reinstatement of historical features on first and second floors, repair work to historical staircases and reinstatement of balustrades, some reconfiguration of ground floor and basement layouts including backfilling of rear basement compartments, lowering of basement floor level to numbers 15 and 16 South Molton Street, installation of roof level plant, demolition and rebuilding of second floor closet extension at 21 South Molton Lane, roofing and other associated works. Removal and re-instatement of modern ceilings and amendments to flooring, provision of fire and acoustic compartmentation, installation of wall linings and other associated works. (SITE INCLUDES 16, 17, 18, 19, 20 AND 21 SOUTH MOLTON STREET)
